recipe.ingredients: 2 cups chickpeas, drained and rinsed,1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved,1 cucumber, diced,1/2 red onion, finely chopped,1/4 cup kalamata olives, sliced,1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled,2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil,1 tablespoon red wine vinegar,1/2 teaspoon dried oregano,1/2 teaspoon dried basil,Salt and pepper to taste,1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped
recipe.directions: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and kalamata olives. Gently mix.,In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.,Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese and fresh parsley over the top of the salad. Toss lightly once more before serving. Can be served immediately or chilled for an hour to allow flavors to meld.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 320,Total fat 14g,Saturated fat 3g,Trans fat 0g,Monounsaturated fat 7g,Polyunsaturated fat 1g,Cholesterol 8mg,Sodium 423mg,Total carbohydrate 38g,Dietary fiber 10g,Total sugars 7g (includes 0g added sugars),Protein 11g
